name: Evil -1
description:
Evil Minus 1 is a first person game which I wanted to make as ridiculous as I could think of but time ran out before I could add any wacky guns or disturbing enemies, so now it is just a generic first person shooter in cube world's arena. Share you're high score if you want! Enjoy.

Controls

Same as every first person shooter:

Move- WASD / Arrow Keys

Run - Left Shift

Jump - Spacebar

Shoot - Left Mouse Button
